text: Source of a frustrating bug. Properly use try/catch to catch all errors, even in brand-new code. Fail to report an error in one branch. Forget to require the fs package. But the error is inside the try, so the runtime doesn't trip an error either. Have the debugger not go into the code that has the error for some reason I won't try to determine. 1 hour later, unwind the mess. :boom:
